alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 30 at 3:00AM PDT until April 30 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 7 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways affected by gusty cross winds may include Highway 1. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches
